ROLE QUEST: UTILITY
Damage enemies or Heal allies to gain stacks. Each time an enemy is damaged or an ally god is healed by your abilities, gain 1 stack. Each ability can only trigger 3 stacks. At 75 Stacks Specialist's Blessing Evolves, gaining 10% Movement Speed.
